metadata.purpose: Strategic objectives and success metrics for Proyecto Gallos de pelea

primary_business_objective.success_definition: Platform processing subscription payments for live event access
primary_business_objective.rationale: Establish sustainable revenue stream to fund platform expansion

metrics.target_mvp: First live transmission with paying subscribers

operational_efficiency_objective.goal: Enable scalable event operations through operator hierarchy
operational_efficiency_objective.success_definition: Operators can manage events independently with proper oversight
operational_efficiency_objective.rationale: Reduce operational bottlenecks as event volume scales

metrics.target_mvp: Operators handle 80% of routine event management
metrics.measurement_method: Time tracking + operator task completion rates

technical_foundation_objective.goal: Establish robust streaming infrastructure supporting 100+ concurrent viewers
technical_foundation_objective.success_definition: Zero stream interruptions during events, sub-3s latency
technical_foundation_objective.rationale: User retention depends on reliable streaming experience

operator_efficiency.target: Operators handle event setup in <30 minutes

admin_time_saved.target: 50% reduction in admin time per event

Q3_2025.primary_focus: MVP launch and initial market validation

technical_risk_mitigation.objective: Minimize platform downtime and performance issues
strategies: Load testing before scaling user base
technical_risk_mitigation.success_criteria: Zero revenue-impacting outages in first 90 days

business_risk_mitigation.objective: Validate market demand and optimize user acquisition
strategies: Pre-launch user testing with existing galleras/venues
Rapid iteration based on user feedback
Multiple subscription tiers for different user segments
business_risk_mitigation.success_criteria: Positive user feedback and growing subscriber base

strategies: Clear operator role definitions and training
operational_risk_mitigation.success_criteria: Operators successfully managing events with minimal admin oversight

feature_prioritization.primary_filter: Does this directly support revenue generation or operational efficiency?
feature_prioritization.secondary_filter: Can this be implemented within resource constraints?

architecture_decisions.primary_filter: Does this support 100+ concurrent users with good performance?
architecture_decisions.secondary_filter: Is this maintainable by solo developer?

business_decisions.primary_filter: Does this accelerate time to revenue or reduce operational costs?
business_decisions.secondary_filter: Is the ROI measurable within 90 days?
